item.description: We'll be conducting an experiment in EVP (Electronic Voice Phenomena) in a local cemetery. No equipment necessary to participate, but if you have a recorder (digital or tape or both) bring it/them along. We'll be starting from my apartment - it's a very easy walking distance to the destination from there - and I have cats, so if you have an allergy to them, let me know in advance and we can meet you outside. I'm limiting the size of this meetup to 6 to prevent the group from being too invasive a presence once the experiment begins. Afterwards (or perhaps during) I'd like to discuss how we should proceed with regard to investigating our first site. Any questions, please e-mail me as soon as they arise. See you there!
item.name: EVP Experiment!
